thread.title: Penn Avenue road concept divides city, county
thread.title_full: Penn Avenue road concept divides city, county

author: Cali Owings
title: Penn Avenue road concept divides city, county
text:
Home / News / Regional Planning & Transit / Penn Avenue road concept divides city, county Penn Avenue in North Minneapolis would be reconstructed to create more room for pedestrians, with tree-lined boulevards and sidewalks. Pictured is the 2000 block of Penn Avenue, where there’s no buffer between the road and sidewalk. (Staff photo: Bill Klotz) Penn Avenue road concept divides city, county By: Cali Owings July 28, 2015 3:48 pm 0 Members of the Minneapolis City Council’s Transportation and Public Works Committee disagreed with the decision to route bikes off of Penn Avenue because bike lanes are included there in the city’s long-term bike plan.
